title: DC bus undervoltage with thermal stress
symptoms: Output voltage droop, rising switch temperature, slight vibration increase
diagnostic_steps: Check DC link capacitors, confirm gate driver supply levels, inspect cooling path

title: IGBT short detection
symptoms: Instant current spike, trip of fast acting fuse, audible click
diagnostic_steps: Isolate half bridge, test gate leakage, verify snubber integrity

title: Motor bearing wear
symptoms: High vibration at specific frequencies, gradual efficiency loss
diagnostic_steps: Perform spectral vibration analysis, inspect lubrication, schedule maintenance
